item.description:
A Trip to Salem is my favorite thing to do!
Let me be your tour guide..........

Our first stop will be to the Witch Dungeons. The original site of the witch dungeons is actually below the phone company, however, they have re-created the dungeons to the specific measurements of the actual dungeons.

The dungeons were cold, and foul smelling, and were kept in total darkness, and the only light that was ever seen, was when the guards entered the dungeon. The dungeon was also near the north river, and during high tide would flood, and the cold water would rise to the prisoner?s ankles, daily. Most of the prisoners were kept in chains, and it was a stomping ground for large river rats. For the prisoners, who were poor, and could not afford to pay for their stay in the dungeon, they were put in coffin like cells, smaller than a phone booth, in which they could only stand.

The tour at the witch dungeons starts out with everyone going into the theater to read the story of the Salem witch trials on the plaques on the walls. Then there is a mini play, of a re-creation of an actual trial taken from real manuscripts that were found in the last several years. The play is done with the accusers and accused on stage, and the people in the crowd treated as those from Salem Town attending the trial.
After the play, the tour guide will give some facts of what happened in Salem in 1692, and then everyone is taken down into the re-creation of the dungeons, to see how big the cells were, and the re-creation of things that happened. The tour ends in the gift shop, and pictures can be taken in the pillorys outside.

You can check out the link for the witch dungeons at:

http://cc.msnscache.c...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We will then be having lunch, at my favorite Salem Restaurant, Victoria Station, which is on the wharf, and specializes in Prime Rib and Sea Food and has the best prime rib sandwiches and chocolate mousse that I have ever tasted! They have a wide variety of selections on their menu which you can check out at:

http://cc.msnscache.c...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
We will then do some "witchy" shopping on the wharf at the following stores:

Laurie Cabot's, the famous witch of Salem's current shop:

http://cc.msnscache.c...

Salem's Tourist Shop at:

http://cc.msnscache.c...

A great shop to stock up on reasonably priced herbs at:

http://localsearch.li...
%2c+MA&s_cid=ansPhBkYp02

The pagan singer Gypsy's Shop- Nu Aeon at:

http://cc.msnscache.c...
VRE2

Then to the famous Pyramid Books:

http://cc.msnscache.c...
VRE3

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Then we will go to best candy store in New England, Ye Olde Pepper Companie down the street near the House of Seven Gables for homemade chocolates and candy- You can check out that link at:

http://cc.msnscache.c...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Then we will head down to the mall, and visit some more interesting shops, including:

Laurie Cabot's first shop, now owned by her adopted daughter- Crow Haven Corner-
Check out the link at:

http://cc.msnscache.c...

One of my favorites,
The Broom Closet:

http://www.broomclose...

The Angel Shop:

http://www.angelicaof...

and a variety of other stores in the mall, including other places with witchy stuff, medieval clothing stores, Witchy T-shirt places, and places where you can have your pictures taken.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We will be meeting at 10am at the Worcester Business Center on Millbrook St. in Worcester, off of
Gold Star Blvd. The exact address will be coming. Plan on not returning to Worcester until
6 or 7pm. We will hopefully be going in (3) cars, (5) ppl each, as parking is difficult in Salem, so spaces
for this trip are limited, if you want to go, don't wait till the last minute to sign up!

I am looking for (2) other volunteers who would be willing to drive, preferably someone with a mini-van.
If you are interested, please email me at:
talawolf7@webtv.net as soon as possible.

Bring lots of money to spend, and expect to have a great time! :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting at the Worcester Business Center on Millbrook St. in Worcester, and I will be in a bright blue Subaru Impreza at the front of the parking lot. :)
item.why: Because you will have a blast! :)
item.name: Trip To Salem
